name: Cyber Seraph
description:
Cyber Seraph is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up where you will be facing diverse bosses on your quest to save your homeworld from annihilation. Collect chips from wounded bosses to unlock special abilities and push onward to final victory.

Features
15 menacing bosses to take down (more to be released later)
Pixel art graphics
8 unlockable abilities, with 24 possible upgrades
Adrenaline pumping, nostalgia rich music (soundtrack can be downloaded / listened to on Steam)
Full controller support
Achievements
Demo
